scripts.release: EM_CACHE=$PWD/build/emscripten_cache emcmake cmake --preset wasm-release -DFETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED=OFF -DFETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED=OFF && EM_CACHE=$PWD/build/emscripten_cache cmake --build --preset wasm-release && node scripts/serve-wasm.js --release
